h2.span: Information and Updates Regarding the Coronavirus will be Added Here:

strong.span: What is Social Distancing? A Resource from Advent Health

span.br:
At the request of Advent Health Durand and in light of the order of Governor Evers we are reminding students and parents to eliminate sleepovers and gatherings of students as we work to control the spread of the virus. The Hospital will only test those students that are having symptoms. Please click here to refer to the graphic.
